type.name: FormCollection
type.summary: Represents a collection of forms. A collection may contain mixed form types or only forms of a specific type. To filter and convert a mixed collection to a specific form collection use the appropriate extension method.

property.name: Count
property.summary: Gets the number of forms in this form collection.

method.name: Add
method.summary: Adds the specified form to this form collection.

method.name: Add
method.summary: Adds the form that has the specified Editor ID to this form collection.

method.name: Contains
method.summary: Determines whether the specified form is in this form collection.

method.name: Contains
method.summary: Determine whether the form with the specified Editor ID is in this form collection.

method.name: HavingTag
method.summary: Creates a new form collection based on this form collection that contains only forms that have been tagged with the specified text.

method.name: Remove
method.summary: Remove the specified form from this form collection.

method.name: Remove
method.summary: Remove the form that has the specified Editor ID from this form collection.

method.name: TagAll
method.summary: Tags all forms in this form collection with the specified text.

method.name: Where
method.summary: Creates a new form collection based on this form collection that contains only forms that satisfy the specified predicate.

method.name: OfAlch
method.summary: Convers and fiters this mixed form collection to a collection of Potion forms.

method.name: OfAmmo
method.summary: Convers and fiters this mixed form collection to a collection of Ammo forms.

method.name: OfArmo
method.summary: Convers and fiters this mixed form collection to a collection of Armor forms.

method.name: OfCobj
method.summary: Convers and fiters this mixed form collection to a collection of Constructible Object forms.

method.name: OfColl
method.summary: Convers and fiters this mixed form collection to a collection of Collision Layer forms.

method.name: OfEnch
method.summary: Convers and fiters this mixed form collection to a collection of Enchantment forms.

method.name: OfEqup
method.summary: Convers and fiters this mixed form collection to a collection of Equipment Type forms.

method.name: OfExpl
method.summary: Convers and fiters this mixed form collection to a collection of Explosion forms.

method.name: OfFlst
method.summary: Convers and fiters this mixed form collection to a collection of Form List forms.

method.name: OfGlob
method.summary: Convers and fiters this mixed form collection to a collection of Global Variable forms.

method.name: OfGmst
method.summary: Convers and fiters this mixed form collection to a collection of Game Setting forms.

method.name: OfIpds
method.summary: Convers and fiters this mixed form collection to a collection of Impact Data Set forms.

method.name: OfKywd
method.summary: Convers and fiters this mixed form collection to a collection of Keyword forms.

method.name: OfLigh
method.summary: Convers and fiters this mixed form collection to a collection of Light forms.

method.name: OfMatt
method.summary: Convers and fiters this mixed form collection to a collection of Material forms.

method.name: OfMgef
method.summary: Convers and fiters this mixed form collection to a collection of Magic Effect forms.

method.name: OfProj
method.summary: Convers and fiters this mixed form collection to a collection of Projectile forms.

method.name: OfRace
method.summary: Convers and fiters this mixed form collection to a collection of Race forms.

method.name: OfSndr
method.summary: Convers and fiters this mixed form collection to a collection of Sound forms.

method.name: OfSpel
method.summary: Convers and fiters this mixed form collection to a collection of Spell forms.

method.name: OfStat
method.summary: Convers and fiters this mixed form collection to a collection of Static forms.

method.name: OfTxst
method.summary: Convers and fiters this mixed form collection to a collection of Texture Set forms.

method.name: OfWeap
method.summary: Convers and fiters this mixed form collection to a collection of Weapon forms.
